dict.acceptation: （she的宾格）她；（she的所有格）她的；她，指某个国家，（一艘）船；

sent.orig: He helped her up to her feet by holding her arm.
sent.trans: 他搀着她的手臂帮她站起身来。

sent.orig: Her close relationship with the teacher increased her unpopularity among her schoolmates.
sent.trans: 她和那位老师的密切关系使她在同学中越发不受欢迎。

sent.orig: Her face twisted up with pain as her leg lay bent beneath her.
sent.trans: 她的腿弯曲着压在身子下疼得她痛苦不堪。

sent.orig: Her friends had deserted her, and she was thrown back on her own resources.
sent.trans: 她的朋友们都抛弃了她，因此她只得依靠自己了。

sent.orig: Her mind misgave her about her friend.
sent.trans: 她对她的朋友心存疑虑。
